title: Chester: a portrait of a city
creator_credit: Ray Gosling, Jim Clark and Granada Television International
brief_description: A sceptical young man investigates Chester - its history, architecture, institutions, day-to-day life. After walking its streets, travelling its river and canals, talking to its people, the young man is converted.
creator_credit_for_label: Ray Gosling, Jim Clark and Granada Television International
